纽约大学朗格健康中心的返校活动为布鲁克林和长岛的学生提供重要支持8 月 28 日，纽约大学朗格健康中心的家庭健康中心在日落公园第 55 街和第二大道交汇处的马丁·路德游乐场举办了第 20 届年度返校活动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/NYU-Langone-Healths-Back-to-School-Drive-provides-vital-support-for-Brooklyn-and-Long-Island-students.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/NYU-Langone-Healths-Back-to-School-Drive-provides-vital-support-for-Brooklyn-and-Long-Island-students.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e47c938-929a-4d14-9c84-3add696b905f Fri, 20 Sep 2024 15:34:00 -0400 NYU Langone Health's Back-to-School Drive provides vital support for Brooklyn and Long Island students

大规模 MRI 研究显示大脑结构与政治意识形态存在微妙联系长期以来，人们一直认为保守派的大脑与进步派的大脑不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Brain-struct-shows-subtle-link-to-political-ideology-in-large-scale-MRI-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Brain-struct-shows-subtle-link-to-political-ideology-in-large-scale-MRI-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee3dfbdd-33eb-4494-ac1d-b8792bed6a29 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 14:26:00 -0400 Brain structure shows subtle link to political ideology in large-scale MRI study

尽管已制定指南，镰状细胞病患者的中风风险仍然上升尽管镰状细胞贫血症中风预防试验 (STOP) 制定了护理标准，例如输血和测量脑部血流量的测试，但患有镰状细胞病 (SCD) 的成人和儿童的中风发病率仍在持续增加-风险，根据《血液》今天发表的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Stroke-risk-rises-in-病人-with-sickle-cell-disease-despite-builted-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Stroke-risk-rises-in-病人-with-sickle-cell-disease-despite-builted-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d87f2d75-2829-4e2d-b110-65b6b2566542 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 14:03:00 -0400 Stroke risk rises in patients with sickle cell disease despite established guidelines
